definition: a soft faintly bluish-white lustrous low-melting crystalline metallic element that is malleable and ductile at ordinary temperatures and that is used especially in containers, as a protective coating, in tinfoil, and in soft solders and alloys  — see Chemical Elements Table
a box, can, pan, vessel, or a sheet made of tinplate

a metal container and its contents                                      
             
             a tin of tomatoes
to cover or plate with tin or a tin alloy

to put up or pack in tins : can                                      
             
             tinned peaches
taxpayer identification number

a container or plate made of metal
a decorative metal box with a cover or lid
a soft bluish white metallic chemical element used chiefly in combination with other metals or as a coating to protect other metals

something (as a can or sheet) made from tinplate                                      
             
             a tin of cookies

definition: a chemical element that is a soft, light silver metal, often used for covering iron or steel. Its symbol is Sn.
a closed metal container for a food product that you open with a tin opener. The American word is can
a metal container with a lid, used for storing things
a metal container used for cooking food in an oven. The American word is pan

a biscuit tin
a cake tin
a roasting/baking tin
does (exactly) what it says on the tin

definition: a chemical element that is a silver-coloured metal, often combined with other metals or used to cover and protect other metals
a closed metal container in which food is sold:
the contents of a tin, or the amount of something a tin contains:
a metal container with a lid used for keeping cakes or biscuits:
a cylindrical metal container with a lid used for keeping liquid substances such as paint:
a metal container without a lid used for cooking food in the oven:
a closed metal container in which beer is sold:
a soft, silver metal that is often combined with other metals or used as a layer to protect various metals

definition: A guy who is both as equally charming as he is funny. He is someone you definitely want to have in your corner and will always be loyal to you. Always saying drawlin' shit but he on his game most of the time.

Marginalized Orientations, Gender identities, And Intersex. it’s meant to be an all inclusive umbrella term for asexuals, homosexuals, multisexuals, trans people, and intersex people. Alternative to LGBTQIAP+
Alternative to MOGII, easier to pronounce.

1.A tightly packaged can of dipping tobacco used to make the dip user "mad buzzed", always paired off with a trusty spitter. Usually done in a social environment full of other dip users. There are many types of tins that come in a variety of flavors (mint, berry, wintergreen, straight, peach, vanilla, toasted marshmallow, etc.) Sometimes flavors are mixed together to make a dip hybrid (ex. Vanilla and Cherry =Cherry Vanilla or Peach and Mint = minty and fruity lip). Always pack your tin before you indulge in the delicious tin.2. A person, place, or thing. Substituted for a noun in a sentence. Referring to a person or some sort of object.
Package (can of sorts) of smokeless tobacco (dip)
Short for toolish in nature
A circular container containing a delicious blend of smokeless tobacco, flavor, and fiber glass.
a shield. the term "tin" is typically reserved for when it's presented to a civilian for any variety of reasons.
